languages.text: {n}Комиссар извлекает из кармана инъектор и ловко вводит вам исцеляющий состав. Вы успеваете заметить на нем стандартную имперскую маркировку.{/n} "Медикаменты у нас в дефиците, но мы своих не бросаем. Выздоравливай, соратни{mf|к|ца}, Император еще не разрешил нам умирать".

{n}The Commissar pulls out an injector and deftly gives you a shot of healing solution. You notice a Munitorum symbol on the injector.{/n} "Medicine is in short supply here, but we do not abandon our own. May you be well, my {mf|brother|sister} in arms! The Emperor has given us no leave to die."
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар извлекает из кармана инъектор и ловко вводит вам исцеляющий состав. Вы успеваете заметить на нем стандартную имперскую маркировку.{/n} "Медикаменты у нас в дефиците, но мы своих не бросаем. Выздоравливай, соратни{mf|к|ца}, Император еще не разрешил нам умирать".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar pulls out an injector and deftly gives you a shot of healing solution. You notice the standard markings of the Imperium on the injector.{/n} "Medicine is in short supply here, but we do not abandon our own. May you be well, my comrade-in-arms! The Emperor gave us no permission to die."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

You notice the standard markings of the Imperium on the injector.{/n} "Medicine is in short supply here, but we do not abandon our own. May you be well, my comrade-in-arms! The Emperor gave us no permission to die."

The Emperor has given us no leave to die."

languages.text: {n}政委掏出一支注射器，以娴熟的动作为你注射了一支治疗药剂。你注意到，注射器上印着帝国军务部的印记。{/n}“我们的药品非常紧缺，但我们绝不会放弃战友。希望你能快点好起来，我的{mf|兄弟|姐妹}！帝皇还没允许我们死在这里呢。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar pulls out an injector and deftly gives you a shot of healing solution. You notice a Munitorum symbol on the injector.{/n} "Medicine is in short supply here, but we do not abandon our own. May you be well, my {mf|brother|sister} in arms! The Emperor has given us no leave to die."

traits.locale_text: {n}政委掏出一支注射器，以娴熟的动作为你注射了一支治疗药剂。你注意到，注射器上印着帝国军务部的印记。{/n}“我们的药品非常紧缺，但我们绝不会放弃战友。希望你能快点好起来，我的{mf|兄弟|姐妹}！帝皇还没允许我们死在这里呢。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは注射器を取り出し、手際よく回復薬を注入してくれる。注射器には帝国兵務局の印が刻印されている。{/n}「ここでは薬が不足していますが、仲間を見捨てるような真似はしません。戦友よ、英気を養ってください！皇帝は我々に死ぬなとおっしゃっています」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar pulls out an injector and deftly gives you a shot of healing solution. You notice a Munitorum symbol on the injector.{/n} "Medicine is in short supply here, but we do not abandon our own. May you be well, my {mf|brother|sister} in arms! The Emperor has given us no leave to die."

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは注射器を取り出し、手際よく回復薬を注入してくれる。注射器には帝国兵務局の印が刻印されている。{/n}「ここでは薬が不足していますが、仲間を見捨てるような真似はしません。戦友よ、英気を養ってください！皇帝は我々に死ぬなとおっしゃっています」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El Comisario saca un inyector y te proporciona una solución curativa. Te fijas en el símbolo del Munitorum que presenta el aparato.{/n} «Aquí no nos sobra la medicina, pero no abandonamos a los nuestros. ¡Que siga en buena salud, herman{mf|o|a} de armas! El Emperador aún no nos ha dado permiso para morir».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar pulls out an injector and deftly gives you a shot of healing solution. You notice a Munitorum symbol on the injector.{/n} "Medicine is in short supply here, but we do not abandon our own. May you be well, my {mf|brother|sister} in arms! The Emperor has given us no leave to die."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario saca un inyector y te proporciona una solución curativa. Te fijas en el símbolo del Munitorum que presenta el aparato.{/n} «Aquí no nos sobra la medicina, pero no abandonamos a los nuestros. ¡Que siga en buena salud, herman{mf|o|a} de armas! El Emperador aún no nos ha dado permiso para morir».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar pulls out an injector and deftly gives you a shot of healing solution. You notice a Munitorum symbol on the injector.{/n} "Medicine is in short supply here, but we do not abandon our own. May you be well, my {mf|brother|sister} in arms! The Emperor has given us no leave to die."

languages.text: {n}Le commissaire vous injecte une solution curative à l'aide d'une seringue portant le symbole du Munitorum.{/n} « Nous manquons de fournitures médicales, mais nous n'abandonnons jamais les nôtres. Remettez-vous bien, {mf|mon frère|ma sœur} d'armes ! L'Empereur ne nous a pas encore autorisés à mourir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar pulls out an injector and deftly gives you a shot of healing solution. You notice a Munitorum symbol on the injector.{/n} "Medicine is in short supply here, but we do not abandon our own. May you be well, my {mf|brother|sister} in arms! The Emperor has given us no leave to die."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commissaire vous injecte une solution curative à l'aide d'une seringue portant le symbole du Munitorum.{/n} « Nous manquons de fournitures médicales, mais nous n'abandonnons jamais les nôtres. Remettez-vous bien, {mf|mon frère|ma sœur} d'armes ! L'Empereur ne nous a pas encore autorisés à mourir. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar zieht einen Injektor hervor und verabreicht dir eine Dosis Heillösung. Du bemerkst auf dem Injektor ein Munitorum-Symbol.{/n} "Medizin ist hier ein seltenes Gut, aber wir lassen die Unseren nicht im Stich. Mögen Eure Wunden heilen, {mf|werter Waffenbruder|werte Waffenschwester}! Der Imperator hat uns noch nicht gestattet, zu sterben."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar pulls out an injector and deftly gives you a shot of healing solution. You notice a Munitorum symbol on the injector.{/n} "Medicine is in short supply here, but we do not abandon our own. May you be well, my {mf|brother|sister} in arms! The Emperor has given us no leave to die."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar zieht einen Injektor hervor und verabreicht dir eine Dosis Heillösung. Du bemerkst auf dem Injektor ein Munitorum-Symbol.{/n} "Medizin ist hier ein seltenes Gut, aber wir lassen die Unseren nicht im Stich. Mögen Eure Wunden heilen, {mf|werter Waffenbruder|werte Waffenschwester}! Der Imperator hat uns noch nicht gestattet, zu sterben."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser, bir şırınga çıkarıp ustalıkla sana bir şifa çözeltisi iğnesi yapıyor. Şırınganın üstündeki Munitorum simgesine gözün takılıyor.{/n} "Burada ilaç bulmak zordur ama bizden olanlar için elimizden geleni yaparız. İyi ol silah arkadaşım! İmparator, henüz ölmemizi uygun görmüyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar pulls out an injector and deftly gives you a shot of healing solution. You notice a Munitorum symbol on the injector.{/n} "Medicine is in short supply here, but we do not abandon our own. May you be well, my {mf|brother|sister} in arms! The Emperor has given us no leave to die."

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser bir şırınga çıkarıp sana ustaca bir şifa çözeltisi iğnesi yapıyor. Şırınganın üstündeki Munitorum simgesi dikkatini çekiyor.{/n} "Burada ilaç bulmak zordur ama bizden olanları terk etmeyiz. İyi ol silah arkadaşım! İmparator ölmemize geçit vermez."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
